message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it is worth $1,500,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the chance to purchase the product at a special introductory price of $1,350,000. This offer is designed to ensure you receive a significant benefit while also maximizing the value for us. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to your positive response.
